{{disambig-more|Arda|[[Arda (disambiguation)]]}}[[Image:Arda journal.png|thumb|Logotype of the annual ''Arda'']]
'''''Arda''''' is a bilingual (Scandinavian/English) publication of the [[Arda-sällskapet|Arda Society]], edited by [[Anders Stenström]]. It is in intention annual, but has not appeared since [[1994]]. In a special series, the proceedings of [[Omentielva]] are published by ''Arda'' as ''Arda Philology''.

==Issues of Arda==
*[[1981]] - Volume I / ''Arda 9'' 
*[[1983]] - Volume II / ''Arda 10''
*[[1986]] - Volume III / ''Arda 1982-83'' 
*[[1988]] - [[Arda 1984/1985|Volume IV & V / ''Arda 1984/1985'']] 
*[[1990]] - [[Arda 1986|Volume VI / ''Arda 1986'']]
*[[1992]] - Volume VII / ''Arda 1987''
*[[1994]] - Volume VIII-IX / ''Arda 1988-1991''
